label: 御持僧
本: State of War: the Violent Order of Fourteenth Century Japan . Michigan University Press . 2003
説明文: Protector priests represented a team of as many as eight esoteric specialists who were stationed in the palace from the eighth century onward. These priests prayed for the well-being of the emperor. Once the Ashikaga attained power in 1336, they had five gojisō pray for Ashikaga Takauji. [護持僧、足利尊氏]
